name: HOCKEY SPACE
description: Fast button-based low rule local multiplayer hockey game. I think it's fun with friends, but most things are.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Processor: i5 Memory: 666 MB RAM Graphics: 1050 / 560 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: 1080*60, lower specs should work fine too.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
